title.narrative: Interim Support to the PNG TVET &#38;#38; Higher Education

description.narrative: This initiative delivers up to four programs that support a range of interim measures supporting the Papua New Guinea (PNG) Technical, Vocational Education and Training (TVET) and Higher Education sub-sectors, while a longer term Higher Education strategy is agreed to by the Governments of Australia and the Government of PNG. These interim measures include: 1) delivery of advisory support for higher level policy advice in Higher Education reform; 2) delivery of advisory support for financial and human resource management at the University of Papua New Guinea (UPNG); 3) continuing delivery of a volunteer program providing academic support to UPNG; 4) continuing to deliver a development studies cadet program; and 5) the development of a post graduate award in development studies. The total value of this initiative is $10.4 million over 4 years, starting 2010-11.
